description: These vegan grilled cheese sandwiches are made with ultra sloppy, ultra delicious, vegan sweet potato nacho cheese, stuffed between two bread slices with tomatoes and grilled to a golden crisp.
name: Vegan Grilled Cheese with Sweet Potato Nacho Cheese
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup vegan sweet potato nacho cheese
2-4 to mato slices (about 1/2 large tomato or 1 small)

recipeInstructions.text: Coat a large skillet with oil and place over medium heat.
Spread vegan nacho sweet potato cheese over 1 bread slice. Top with tomato slices, sprinkle with salt and pepper, then top with other bread slice.
Place in skillet and cook until golden brown on bottom, 3-4 minutes. Flip and cook another 3-4 minutes on opposite side.
